svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
April 22, 2023" date: "2023-04-21"
* A list of what exactly might make it into Dencun besides 4844 (protodankscaling).
Discussion at the next call on April 27
A list of what exactly might make it into Dencun besides 4844 (protodankscaling).
* Latest consensus layer devs call . Notes from Christine Kim EIP4788 (expose CL state
in EL) likely included in Dencun 4844 devnet5 next week discussion of long-lived
Latest consensus layer devs call . Notes from Christine Kim
* EIP4788 (expose CL state in EL) likely included in Dencun
EIP4788 (expose CL state in EL) likely included in Dencun
* discussion of long-lived subnets to reduce bandwidth use
discussion of long-lived subnets to reduce bandwidth use
* KZG ceremony is open again for public contributions, but your Eth account needs over
128 mainnet transactions. If the waiting list declines, then the threshold will be
reduced. Follow @carlbeek to find out if threshold is reduced
KZG ceremony is open again for public contributions, but your Eth account needs over
* Four options for transitioning to Verkle trees would look like
Four options for transitioning to Verkle trees would look like
* Two slots proposer builder separation with unconditional payment
Two slots proposer builder separation with unconditional payment
* Paprika , Nethermind’s experimental storage abstraction of Patricia tree
Paprika , Nethermind’s experimental storage abstraction of Patricia tree
* Equivocation attacks in MEV-boost and ePBS
Equivocation attacks in MEV-boost and ePBS
* Optimistic relays increase validator profits and are cheaper to maintain
Optimistic relays increase validator profits and are cheaper to maintain
* How to track the performance of your validator
How to track the performance of your validator
* Benchmarking bandwidth consumption with Shapella (Geth and Lighthouse) finds ~20%
Benchmarking bandwidth consumption with Shapella (Geth and Lighthouse) finds ~20%
* Lighthouse v4.1 - fix excessive CPU usage
Lighthouse v4.1 - fix excessive CPU usage
* Rocketpool Atlas upgrade live, allows staking with 8 ETH and triples Rocketpool’s
Rocketpool Atlas upgrade live, allows staking with 8 ETH and triples Rocketpool’s
* How to start running a distributed validator with Obol
How to start running a distributed validator with Obol
* Client diversity coming with Optimism’s Bedrock upgrade: Magi, a16z’s Optimism client
in rust OP-Erigon , a fork of Erigon for Optimism
* Magi, a16z’s Optimism client in rust
Magi, a16z’s Optimism client in rust
* OP-Erigon , a fork of Erigon for Optimism
OP-Erigon , a fork of Erigon for Optimism
* EIPs: EIP6888 : EVM math checking EIP6913 : SETCODE instruction EIP6914 : Reuse
* ERCs: ERC6882 : sharable interface for borrowing ERC6884 : Extendable Utility Tokens
Derived from Origin NFTs ERC6916 : Automatic reset of testnet ERC6912 : Versioned
TokenIDs for Dynamic NFTs ERC6909 : simplified alternative to erc1155 ERC6900 : modular
* ERC6884 : Extendable Utility Tokens Derived from Origin NFTs
ERC6884 : Extendable Utility Tokens Derived from Origin NFTs
* ERC6912 : Versioned TokenIDs for Dynamic NFTs
ERC6912 : Versioned TokenIDs for Dynamic NFTs
This newsletter is made possible thanks to the funding received from Optimism’s
Thank you to Optimism’s RetroPGF round 2 which generously funded Week in Ethereum News
* viem v0.3.x , bugfixes and ethcall batch aggregation
viem v0.3.x , bugfixes and ethcall batch aggregation
* wagmi’s plan for migrating to viem
wagmi’s plan for migrating to viem
* ZeroMEV API , transaction level MEV summary data
ZeroMEV API , transaction level MEV summary data
* Hundred hacked for 7.4m on Optimism, due to poorly deployed fork of compound v2
* Gas prices highest this week since the Merge (ie ~80 gwei during UTC day and ~35 gwei
during UTC night) lead to over 100k burned since the Merge
Gas prices highest this week since the Merge (ie ~80 gwei during UTC day and ~35 gwei
* Devconnect announced in Istanbul for November 13-19
Devconnect announced in Istanbul for November 13-19
* Société Générale launches Euro stablecoin on mainnet
* Kwenta launches SmartMargin and currently has 3 different rewards programs for
Kwenta launches SmartMargin and currently has 3 different rewards programs for traders
* Use an onchain NFT as your Uniswap frontend
Use an onchain NFT as your Uniswap frontend
* Brantly Millegan’s proposal for an onchain follow protocol
Brantly Millegan’s proposal for an onchain follow protocol
* Who is delegating to you in DAOs ?
Who is delegating to you in DAOs ?
* Ameen announces Hai , multi-collateral Rai fork on optimism
Ameen announces Hai , multi-collateral Rai fork on optimism
* What can you do with zk-ECDSA at the app layer?
What can you do with zk-ECDSA at the app layer?
* Snr React Native UI Dev at Status: All jobs
Snr React Native UI Dev at Status: All jobs
* Solidity team are looking for a highly skilled Dev Advocate
Solidity team are looking for a highly skilled Dev Advocate
* EF Ecosystem Support Program seek a Grant Analyst & Liaison
EF Ecosystem Support Program seek a Grant Analyst & Liaison
Job listings: $600 for four issues (75 character limit), payable to abcoathup.eth.
* Coinbase licensed in Bermuda to launch derivatives exchange
Coinbase licensed in Bermuda to launch derivatives exchange
* Gensler repeatedly refuses to say ETH is not a security , even though in 2018 he
recognized that ETH was not a security
Gensler repeatedly refuses to say ETH is not a security , even though in 2018 he
* SEC labels Algorand an unregistered security in complaint against Bittrex. In 2019,
Gary Gensler caught on tape pumping Algorand
SEC labels Algorand an unregistered security in complaint against Bittrex.
* Gary Gensler’s contradiction in the middle
Gary Gensler’s contradiction in the middle
* Europe votes for uniform legal framework for EU crypto markets
Europe votes for uniform legal framework for EU crypto markets
* Next week Alex Pertsev to be released to house arrest to prepare for June trial
Next week Alex Pertsev to be released to house arrest to prepare for June trial
* Consensys reports data leak of Metamask support tickets
Consensys reports data leak of Metamask support tickets
* Tayvano on a mysterious wallet drainer , where there is no common thread between
Tayvano on a mysterious wallet drainer , where there is no common thread between
* If you haven’t yet, make sure your iPhone and iOS are up to date
If you haven’t yet, make sure your iPhone and iOS are up to date
Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow @abcoathup
and @evan_van_ness to get most of the week’s news in real time.
* Apr 25 - May 9 – Gitcoin Program Beta Round
Apr 25 - May 9 – Gitcoin Program Beta Round
* Apr 27-30 – Istanbul ETH Privacy conference & hackathon
Apr 27-30 – Istanbul ETH Privacy conference & hackathon
* Apr 28 – deadline for EF’s Next Billion fellowship cohort 3
Apr 28 – deadline for EF’s Next Billion fellowship cohort 3
* May 5-10 – ETHTallinn hackathon & NFT Tallinn conference
May 5-10 – ETHTallinn hackathon & NFT Tallinn conference
* Aug 28-30 – Science of Blockchain Conference (Stanford University)
Aug 28-30 – Science of Blockchain Conference (Stanford University)
Sign up to receive this newsletter weekly
